entry.title: Former Celtic player responds to Lionel Messi’s comments
entry.summary: There are just some games that become part of folklore. It is safe to say that Celtic’s 2-1 win over the legendary Barcelona team back in 2012 is certainly one such match which is talked about and fondly remembered to this day, more than a decade later.
